text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px;
text.tspan: from base import alphabet, input_for_cipher_short, input_for_cipher_long, output_from_decrypted
